tool_description: Monitors and retrieves real-time status updates for orders across multiple venues, including fill information and state changes.

order_ids.description: List of venue order IDs to monitor

venue_connections.description: List of active connection IDs for venues

include_fills.description: Whether to include detailed fill information

error_messages: Order ID not found: One or more order IDs do not exist or are not accessible.
Connection unavailable: One or more venue connections are inactive or expired.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many status requests. Increase polling interval.
Invalid polling interval: Polling interval must be between 1 and 300 seconds.
usage: Provide arrays of order IDs and corresponding venue connection IDs. Optionally configure fill details and polling frequency.

order_statuses.description: Array of order status strings in format 'order_id:status:filled_quantity'
